item.title: How Hackers use DNS Spoofing to redirect victims to fake websites
item.description: Introduction Welcome Guys, In this blog we are going to see How hackers use basic DNS Spoofing to redirect victims to fake websites This blog is divided into 2 parts: Theory behind DNS Spoofing Practical Scenario Preparing the weapons to perform the attack Performing the attack Theory behind DNS Spoofing Lets understand 2 terms first: DNS Spoofing What is DNS ? DNS stands for Domain Name System Every webserver you see in the world has an IP address (like 157.
